title: Accounts
description:
This API includes any service related to the management of accounts.  

An account is an arranged financial product between a bank and a user, where a user may deposit and withdraw money and, in some cases, be paid interest.

There are several types of accounts based on various parameters such as the origin of the balance (current account or credit account), currency (foreign currency account), functionality (savings), etc.

structuredValue.CCC: Código Cuenta Cliente, Spanish for "Customer Account Code". It is a name given in Spain to a standard Bank Account

structuredValue.IBAN: Internacional Bank Account Number. Is the standard 'EBS204', also according to the ISO 13616, of the European Committee for Banking Standards for identify Bank Accounts

structuredValue.SWIFT: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication. Provides the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) that identifies financial institutions, without going into the specific account

structuredValue.CLABE: Clave Bancaria Estandarizada, Spanish for "Standardized Banking Cipher". It is a banking standard for the numbering of bank accounts in Mexico

structuredValue.SPEI: Electronic Payments Interbanking System (Sistema de Pagos Electrónicos Interbancarios). This format is used for making transfers easily by only knowing the phone number of the transferee

structuredValue.LIC: Local Internal Code. This code is a BBVA internal code generated by those countries where there's no official regulation for numbering bank accounts

numberType.id.name: numberType.id
numberType.id.description: Filters the account's list by account number type.

number.name: number
number.description: Filters the account's list by account number.

reminderCode.name: reminderCode
reminderCode.description: Filters the account's list by friendly identifier.

structuredValue.COMMON_ACCOUNT: Customers can make local currency-based incomes\expenses over accounts of this kind. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CURRENCY_ACCOUNT: Customers can make foreign currency-based incomes\expenses over accounts of this kind. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CREDIT_ACCOUNT: Kind of account in which the customer is granted a monetary amount in the local currency. This granted credit is available for a period of time. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CREDIT_CURRENCY_ACCOUNT: Kind of account in which the customer is granted a monetary amount in a foreign currency. This granted credit is available for a period of time. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

toAvailableBalance.currentBalances.amoun.name: toAvailableBalance.currentBalances.amount

toDisposedBalance.currentBalances.amount.name: toDisposedBalance.currentBalances.amount

properties.name: id
properties.description: Identifier of the financial product. Each name groups accounts of the same category based on their financial characteristics.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the financial product.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the financial product.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Identifier associated to the title.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name associated to the title of the financial product. This is the commercial name by which the user knows this product.

properties.name: alias
properties.description: User-customizable alias assigned to the account to name the account the way the user likes.

properties.name: openingDate
properties.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the account creation date.

properties.name: currencies
properties.description: Currencies related to the account. Monetary amounts related to the account may be provided in one or many of these currencies.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency.

properties.name: isMajor
properties.description: Flag indicating whether this currency corresponds to the main currency.

structuredValue.description: For 'Bono Fácil' accounts, grantedCredits will be set to the total invoicing amount provided the month before.

properties.name: grantedCredits
properties.description: Granted credit. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). This attribute is mandatory for credit accounts. It\'s represented by the granted credit monetary amount and the currency related to the granted credit amount.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Granted credit monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the granted credit amount.

properties.name: availableBalance
properties.description: This attribute provides the account balance. This balance may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country).

properties.name: currentBalances
properties.description: This balance means the maximum expendable amount at the moment of retrieval. It\'s represented by the current available balance monetary amount and the urrency related to the current available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Current available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the current available balance.

properties.name: postedBalances
properties.description: This balance is the maximum expendable amount calculated at the end of the last business day. It\'s represented by the posted available balance monetary amount and the currency related to the posted available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Posted available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the posted available balance.

properties.name: pendingBalances
properties.description: This balance is the aggregated amount of all pending transactions. This amount is the result of substracting postedBalance to currentBalance. It\'s represented by the pending available balance monetary amount and the currency related to the pending available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Pending available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the pending available balance.

properties.name: disposedBalance
properties.description: This balance is the total spent amount from granted credit. This attribute is mandatory for credit accounts.

properties.name: currentBalances
properties.description: This balance provides the total spent amount from granted credit. This balance may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). It\'s represented by the current disposed balance monetary amount and the currency related to the current disposed balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Current disposed balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the current disposed balance.

properties.name: postedBalances
properties.description: This balance is the spent amount from granted credit calculated at the end of the last business day. This balance may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). It\'s represented by the posted disposed balance monetary amount and the currency related to the posted disposed balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Posted disposed balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the posted disposed balance.

properties.name: pendingBalances
properties.description: This balance is the aggregated amount of all pending transactions over granted credit. This amount is the result of substracting postedBalances to currentBalances. This balance may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). It\'s represented by the pending disposed balance monetary amount and the currency related to the pending disposed balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Pending disposed balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the pending disposed balance.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the account.

structuredValue.BLOCKED: The account has been blocked by a justified reason.

structuredValue.CANCELED: The account is canceled and the user can't operate with it.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Identifier associated to the account status.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name associated to the account status. This name is used to describe the status of the account.

properties.name: image
properties.description: Associated image to the account.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Identifier of the image.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the image.

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to reach the image.

properties.name: paymentMethod
properties.description: Credit debt payment method. This method is the configuration selected by the user for paying the credit debt terms. The amounts are calculated based on the existing total debt amount at the end of the last period. This is mandatory for credit accounts.

properties.name: paymentType
properties.description: Payment method type. This type refers to the selected amount to be paid in each term.

structuredValue.TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: The debt will be paid entirelly.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: Only the minimum amount will be paid.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_TO_AVOID_INTEREST_PAYMENT: Only the minimum amount that can be paid to not incur on interest charges will be paid.

structuredValue.FIXED_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: A fixed amount will be paid.

structuredValue.FIXED_PERCENTAGE_PAYMENT: A fixed percentage of the debt will be paid.

structuredValue.FREE_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: The account holder will pay a free amount manually.

properties.description: Monetary amount for the selected payment method. This attribute will not be provided if either percentage or free payment methods are selected. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country).

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Monetary payment amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the monetary payment amount.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage value used within the selected payment method. This attribute is mandatory for percentage payment method, and will not be provided if monetary payment method is selected.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the last date on which the current payment term must be made before being considered in arrears.

properties.name: paymentAmounts
properties.description: List of precalculated amounts for paying credit debt. These amounts are calculated based on the existing total debt amount at the moment the last period ended.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT: Minimum amount that must be paid to avoid failing payments.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_TO_AVOID_INTEREST: Minimum amount that can be paid to not incur on interest charges.

structuredValue.TOTAL_DEBT_AMOUNT: Total amount that can be paid. This amount matches with the existing disposedBalance.currentBalances amount at the end of the last period's cutoffDate. This amount includes all account debts, even deferred payments.

structuredValue.LAST_PERIOD_AMOUNT: Total spent amount during the last period, including the paid terms from financing payments.

resources.description:
Service for managing the differents blocks in an account.

An account can be blocked for different reasons, for instance in the event of fraud. The bank can also block an account due to other security reasons.

A block doesn't block an amount of money, it blocks all the account. If the account is blocked, the user will not be able to perform any operation with it.

properties.name: concept
properties.description: Transaction type depending on the product type and on the money flow.

structuredValue.REFUND: It's an amount that you receives for refund commercial transactions.

structuredValue.PURCHASE: It's the expense of money in commercial transactions.

structuredValue.CASH_INCOME: A cash income is an income received in the form of cash.

structuredValue.CASH_WITHDRAWAL: It's the action of obtain cash at ATM or brand.

structuredValue.PAYROLL_INCOME: It's the income of the payroll of the user.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_INCOME: It's a transfer whose money flow is income, being transfered from another account or card.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_OUTCOME: It's a transfer whose money flow is expense, transfering money to another account.

structuredValue.CREDIT_CARD_RECEIPT: It's a bill which groups all the transactions that a user makes with a credit card.

properties.name: availableBalance
properties.description: Related contract available balance after the transaction was accounted. This balance is the available amount.

properties.name: currentBalances
properties.description: This balance means the maximum expendable amount at the moment of retrieval. It\'s represented by the current available balance monetary amount and the urrency related to the current available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Current available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the current available balance.

properties.name: postedBalances
properties.description: This balance is the maximum expendable amount calculated at the end of the last business day. It\'s represented by the posted available balance monetary amount and the currency related to the posted available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Posted available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the posted available balance.

properties.name: pendingBalances
properties.description: This balance is the aggregated amount of all pending transactions. This amount is the result of substracting postedBalance to currentBalance. It\'s represented by the pending available balance monetary amount and the currency related to the pending available balance.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Pending available balance monetary amount.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the pending available balance.

properties.description: Identifier associated to the relationship between the card and the contract.

properties.description: Identifier associated to the contract.

properties.name: number
properties.description: Contract number.

properties.name: numberType
properties.description: Contract number type based on the financial product type.

structuredValue.CCC: Código Cuenta Cliente, Spanish for "Customer Account Code". It is a name given in Spain to a standard Bank Account

structuredValue.IBAN: Internacional Bank Account Number. Is the standard 'EBS204', also according to the ISO 13616, of the European Committee for Banking Standards for identify Bank Accounts

structuredValue.SWIFT: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication. Provides the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) that identifies financial institutions, without going into the specific account

structuredValue.PAN: Primary Account Number. It consists of 14, 15 or 16 digit numbers that are embossed and/or encoded on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account

structuredValue.CLABE: Clave Bancaria Estandarizada, Spanish for "Standardized Banking Cipher". It is a banking standard for the numbering of bank accounts in Mexico

structuredValue.SPEI: Electronic Payments Interbanking System (Sistema de Pagos Electrónicos Interbancarios). This format is used for making transfers easily by only knowing the phone number of the transferee

structuredValue.LIC: Local Internal Code. This code is a BBVA internal code generated by those countries where there's no official regulation for numbering bank accounts

Method for retrieving the list of transactions related to a specific account.

The result will be a list of detailed movements.

structuredValue.SWIFT: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication. Provides the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) that identifies financial institutions, without going into the specific account

structuredValue.PAN: Primary Account Number. It consists of 14, 15 or 16 digit numbers that are embossed and/or encoded on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account

structuredValue.CLABE: Clave Bancaria Estandarizada, Spanish for "Standardized Banking Cipher". It is a banking standard for the numbering of bank accounts in Mexico

structuredValue.SPEI: Electronic Payments Interbanking System (Sistema de Pagos Electrónicos Interbancarios). This format is used for making transfers easily by only knowing the phone number of the transferee

structuredValue.LIC: Local Internal Code. This code is a BBVA internal code generated by those countries where there's no official regulation for numbering bank accounts

structuredValue.COMMON_ACCOUNT: Customers can make local currency-based incomes\expenses over accounts of this kind. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CURRENCY_ACCOUNT: Customers can make foreign currency-based incomes\expenses over accounts of this kind. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CREDIT_ACCOUNT: Kind of account in which the customer is granted a monetary amount in the local currency. This granted credit is available for a period of time. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.CREDIT_CURRENCY_ACCOUNT: Kind of account in which the customer is granted a monetary amount in a foreign currency. This granted credit is available for a period of time. Customers can make use of these accounts' balance through ATMs and branches.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT: Minimum amount that must be paid to avoid failing payments.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_TO_AVOID_INTEREST: Minimum amount that can be paid to not incur on interest charges.

structuredValue.TOTAL_DEBT_AMOUNT: Total amount that can be paid. This amount matches with the existing disposedBalance.currentBalances amount at the end of the last period's cutoffDate. This amount includes all account debts, even deferred payments.

structuredValue.LAST_PERIOD_AMOUNT: Total spent amount during the last period, including the paid terms from financing payments.

values.name: values
values.description: Payment amount value. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). It\'s represented by the payment amount and the currency related to the payment amount.

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the payment amount.

structuredValue.TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: The debt will be paid entirelly.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: Only the minimum amount will be paid.

structuredValue.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_TO_AVOID_INTEREST_PAYMENT: Only the minimum amount that can be paid to not incur on interest charges will be paid.

structuredValue.FIXED_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: A fixed amount will be paid.

structuredValue.FIXED_PERCENTAGE_PAYMENT: A fixed percentage of the debt will be paid.

structuredValue.FREE_AMOUNT_PAYMENT: The account holder will pay a free amount manually.

paymentType.name: paymentType
paymentType.description: Payment method type. This type refers to the selected amount to be paid in each term.

period.name: period
period.description: Payment method period selected by the user for paying credit debt.

monetaryPayments.name: monetaryPayments
monetaryPayments.description: Monetary amount for the selected payment method. This attribute will not be provided if either percentage or free payment methods are selected. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country).

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the monetary payment amount.

percentage.name: percentage
percentage.description: Percentage value used within the selected payment method. This attribute is mandatory for percentage payment method, and will not be provided if monetary payment method is selected.

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the last date on which the current payment term must be made before being considered in arrears.

paymentAmounts.name: paymentAmounts
paymentAmounts.description: List of precalculated amounts for paying credit debt. These amounts are calculated based on the existing total debt amount at the moment the last period ended.

structuredValue.OPENING_FEE: This condition only applies when the user has opened a new account.

structuredValue.MIN_BALANCE_FEE: This condition applies for maintenance of the account.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_FEE_PERCENTAGE: This condition applies when the user makes a transfer.

structuredValue.MEMBERSHIP_FEE: This condition applies for fixing an account maintenance fee.

structuredValue.CHRISTMAS_CAMPAIGN: This condition applies for christmas campaign.

period.name: period

checkDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the next date when the Facts will be evaluated.

currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the Fact amount amount.

apply.name: apply
apply.description: Property or value over which Fact value applies.

outcomes.name: outcomes

currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the Outcome amount amount.

apply.name: apply
apply.description: Property or value over which Outcome fee applies.

dueDate.name: dueDate
dueDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the next date when the Outcome will be generated.

number.name: number
number.description: Account number. This number consists in an alpha-numerical sequence to identify an account.

numberType.name: numberType
numberType.description: Type of account number. This type identifies the universal standard of an account number.

structuredValue.description: This attribute is used to manage Número de Cuenta Simple value. This value is an 8 to 11 digit user-customizable account number that can be used as account number for transfers.

paymentMethod.monetaryPayments.name: monetaryPayments
paymentMethod.monetaryPayments.description: Monetary amount for the selected payment method. This attribute will not be provided if either percentage or free payment methods are selected. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country).

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the monetary payment amount.

paymentMethod.monetaryPayments.currency.name: currency
paymentMethod.monetaryPayments.currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the monetary payment amount.

paymentMethod.percentage.name: percentage
paymentMethod.percentage.description: Percentage value used within the selected payment method. This attribute is mandatory for percentage payment method, and will not be provided if monetary payment method is selected.

paymentMethod.endDate.name: endDate
paymentMethod.endDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the last date on which the current payment term must be made before being considered in arrears.

paymentMethod.paymentAmounts.name: paymentAmounts
paymentMethod.paymentAmounts.description: List of precalculated amounts for paying credit debt. These amounts are calculated based on the existing total debt amount at the moment the last period ended.

structuredValue.OPENING_FEE: This condition only applies when the user has opened a new account.

structuredValue.MIN_BALANCE_FEE: This condition applies for maintenance of the account.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_FEE_PERCENTAGE: This condition applies when the user makes a transfer.

structuredValue.MEMBERSHIP_FEE: This condition applies for fixing an account maintenance fee.

structuredValue.CHRISTMAS_CAMPAIGN: This condition applies for christmas campaign.

account.number.name: number
account.number.description: Account number. This number consists in an alpha-numerical sequence to identify an account.

account.numberType.description: Type of account number. This type identifies the universal standard of an account number.

structuredValue.description: This attribute is used to manage Número de Cuenta Simple value. This value is an 8 to 11 digit user-customizable account number that can be used as account number for transfers.

account.reminderCode.name: reminderCode
account.reminderCode.description: Friendly identifier where the user may be generated an account number easy to remember for use.

account.formats.name: formats
account.formats.description: Other formats associated to the account used to identify it.

account.title.name: title
account.title.description: Title of the financial product. This is the commercial name by which the user knows this product.

account.alias.name: alias
account.alias.description: User-customizable alias assigned to the account to name the account the way the user likes.

account.address.name: address
account.address.description: User\'s address associated to the account.

account.openingDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the account creation date.

account.cutOffDate.name: cutOffDate
account.cutOffDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format for specifying the date when the current credit account period ends and the next one starts. All the transactions performed until this date will be added to the next payment term.

account.currencies.name: currencies
account.currencies.description: Currencies related to the account. Monetary amounts related to the account may be provided in one or many of these currencies.

structuredValue.description: For 'Bono Fácil' accounts, grantedCredits will be set to the total invoicing amount provided the month before.

account.grantedCredits.name: grantedCredits
account.grantedCredits.description: Granted credit. This amount may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country). This attribute is mandatory for credit accounts. It\'s represented by the granted credit monetary amount and the currency related to the granted credit amount.

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the granted credit amount.

account.grantedCredits.currency.name: currency
account.grantedCredits.currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 for specifying the currency related to the granted credit amount.

account.availableBalance.name: availableBalance
account.availableBalance.description: This attribute provides the account balance. This balance may be provided in several currencies (depending on the country).

account.disposedBalance.name: disposedBalance
account.disposedBalance.description: This balance is the total spent amount from granted credit. This attribute is mandatory for credit accounts.

account.paymentMethod.name: paymentMethod
account.paymentMethod.description: Credit debt payment method. This method is the configuration selected by the user for paying the credit debt terms. The amounts are calculated based on the existing total debt amount at the end of the last period. This is mandatory for credit accounts.

account.participants.name: participants
account.participants.description: Account participants. An account participant is any allowed person by the account holder who has permissions over an account to make operations.

structuredValue.CCC: Código Cuenta Cliente, Spanish for "Customer Account Code". It is a name given in Spain to a standard Bank Account

structuredValue.IBAN: Internacional Bank Account Number. Is the standard 'EBS204', also according to the ISO 13616, of the European Committee for Banking Standards for identify Bank Accounts

structuredValue.SWIFT: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication. Provides the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) that identifies financial institutions, without going into the specific account

structuredValue.PAN: Primary Account Number. It consists of 14, 15 or 16 digit numbers that are embossed and/or encoded on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account

structuredValue.CLABE: Clave Bancaria Estandarizada, Spanish for "Standardized Banking Cipher". It is a banking standard for the numbering of bank accounts in Mexico

structuredValue.SPEI: Electronic Payments Interbanking System (Sistema de Pagos Electrónicos Interbancarios). This format is used for making transfers easily by only knowing the phone number of the transferee

structuredValue.LIC: Local Internal Code. This code is a BBVA internal code generated by those countries where there's no official regulation for numbering bank accounts

relatedContract.relationType.description: Type of relation between the related contract and the card.

structuredValue.HOLDER: It refers to the account owner.

structuredValue.AUTHORIZED: Allowed user by the account owner to operate with the account.

structuredValue.REFUND: It's an amount that you receives for refund commercial transactions.

structuredValue.PURCHASE: It's the expense of money in commercial transactions.

structuredValue.CASH_INCOME: A cash income is an income received in the form of cash.

structuredValue.CASH_WITHDRAWAL: It's the action of obtain cash at ATM or brand.

structuredValue.PAYROLL_INCOME: It's the income of the payroll of the user.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_INCOME: It's a transfer whose money flow is income, being transfered from another account or card.

structuredValue.TRANSFER_OUTCOME: It's a transfer whose money flow is expense, transfering money to another account.

structuredValue.CREDIT_CARD_RECEIPT: It's a bill which groups all the transactions that a user makes with a credit card.

transactions.authorizationType.description: Authorized user type who made the transaction.

transactions.originAmount.name: originAmount
transactions.originAmount.description: Transaction amount in the original currency. If the related contract is based on EUR but the transaction was done in USD, this amount will be provided in USD. It\'s represented by the origin currency monetary amount and the currency related to the origin currency amount.

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 format for specifying the currency related to the origin currency amount.

transactions.originAmount.currency.name: currency
transactions.originAmount.currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 format for specifying the currency related to the origin currency amount.

transactions.localAmount.name: localAmount
transactions.localAmount.description: Transaction amount in the default local currency related to the contract. If the related contract is based on EUR but the transaction was done in USD, this amount will be provided in EUR. It's represented by the local currency monetary amount and the currency related to the local currency amount.

currency.name: currency
currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 format for specifying the currency related to the local currency amount.

transactions.localAmount.currency.name: currency
transactions.localAmount.currency.description: String based on ISO-4217 format for specifying the currency related to the local currency amount.

transactions.postedDate.name: postedDate
transactions.postedDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format when the transaction was done.

transactions.availableDate.name: availableDate
transactions.availableDate.description: String based on ISO-8601 date format when the transaction was accounted.

transactions.transactionTimestamp.name: transactionTimestamp
transactions.transactionTimestamp.description: String based on ISO-8601 timestamp format when the transaction was done.

transactions.name.name: name
transactions.name.description: Brief description related to the transaction concept.

transactions.concept.name: concept
transactions.concept.description: Transaction type depending on the product type and on the money flow.

transactions.moneyFlow.name: moneyFlow
transactions.moneyFlow.description: Indicates whether the transaction is an addition or a substraction.

transactions.checkNumber.name: checkNumber
transactions.checkNumber.description: CL, US: Transaction check number. If the transaction was caused by a check, this attribute refers to the related checkbook.

transactions.availableBalance.name: availableBalance
transactions.availableBalance.description: Related contract available balance after the transaction was accounted. This balance is the available amount.

transactions.tags.name: tags
transactions.tags.description: Tags used by a user to annotate transactions.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_TRANSFER_TO_ACCOUNT: The account can be the origin of a transfer to an account.

structuredValue.DESTINATION_TRANSFER_FROM_ACCOUNT: The account can be the destination of a transfer from another account.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_INTERNAL_TRANSFER_TO_ACCOUNT: The account can be the origin of a transfer between user's internal accounts.

structuredValue.DESTINATION_INTERNAL_TRANSFER_FROM_ACCOU: The account can be the destination of a transfer between user's internal accounts.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_TO_ACCOUNT: The account can be the origin of an international transfer to another account.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_INMEDIATE_PAYMENT: The account can be origin for inmediate payment.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_SOLIDARY_CONTRIBUTION: The account can be origin to a solidary contribution.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_MOBILE_CASH: The account can be origin of a transfer to a mobile device for cardless withdrawal in an ATM.

structuredValue.DESTINATION_INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_FROM_: The account can be destination of an international transfer from another account.

structuredValue.ASSOCIABLE_TO_PHONE_FOR_SPEI: The account can be associated to a phone number for SPEI functionality.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_CURRENCY_EXCHANGE: The account can be used for request foreign currency.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_SERVICE_PAYMENT: The account can be used for service payment.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_TRANSFER_TO_CARD: The account can be the origin of a transfer to a debit or credit card.

structuredValue.DESTINATION_TRANSFER_FROM_CARD: The account can be the destination of a transfer from a debit or credit card.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_TAX_PAYMENT: The account can be used for paying public taxes.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_TO_CARD: The account can be the origin of an international transfer to a card.

structuredValue.DESTINATION_INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_FROM_: The account can be the destination of an international transfer to a card.

structuredValue.ORIGIN_MOBILE_PHONE_RECHARGES: The account can be used for recharging mobile phones.
